thread.title: Lintelus To Display Engagement Tech at HSMAI National Meet
thread.title_full: Lintelus To Display Engagement Tech at HSMAI National Meet

author: Deep
title: Lintelus To Display Engagement Tech at HSMAI National Meet
text:
"We are currently updating our website and doing maintenance. We apologize for the inconvenience." Home » GLOBAL TRAVEL NEWS » Lintelus To Display Engagement Tech at HSMAI National Meet Lintelus To Display Engagement Tech at HSMAI National Meet   
Lintelus Inc, a presentation solution provider company, will participate in an academic session at HSMAI’s National MEET Conference, at the Marriott Wardman Park in Washington DC on Wednesday, September 9, at 2:15 pm EST. The session will focus on various engagement technologies to enhance the attendee experience at conferences, meetings and events. Lintelus will also be hosting booth #611 so attendees can experience more closely their audience engagement solution. HSMAI’s annual conference brings together more than 1,300 planning professionals who are looking to expand their networks, learn the latest trends and technologies, and enhance their careers. Lintelus will be showcasing their digital file sharing technology, which allows presenters, trainers, meeting hosts and educators to share their presentation on an attendee’s electronic device. Within seconds, meeting and event attendees can access the file and follow along in real time, putting an end to passive presentations. This real-time live meeting enhancing solution allows participants to interact with the content and take notes directly on each slide, without the need to download an app. “We look forward to participating at HSMAI and interacting with the top meeting planning professionals,” commented Fathi Hakam, President & CEO of Lintelus Inc. “We believe meetings, events, conferences and educational sessions are essentially about connecting people and sharing information. Just the proper tools are needed to kick up audience interaction and engagement and we are there to help equip them.” Source:- HSMAI
